summary:
change all the arrows in skyrim to give them rune or shockwave spells
differnet arrows have different method -explode upon impact' explode upon proximity and explode on timer
descriptionHtml:
this mod is an overhull to almost every arrow in the game. the arrows has been given explosive runes
 which means everybody is on equal grounds (god among gods is just a regular joe)
i Deactiveted the shockwave om impact arrows  because been "fus ro dah"  all the time is not fun and 1 bandit could fuck you up

ARROW TYPES
some of them explode on impact - just dodge and you are safe (no shockwave to fear)
some of them explode on time - somebody shot an arrow next to you but you are behind a rock? think you are safe? - better run for your life before boom!
some of them on proximity -becerful while runing through a field full of arrows
if you are looking for challange this is for you

FEW THINGS TO CONSIDER BEFORE DOWNLOADING
1. its my first mod so feel free to critisize 
2.the explosive are not silent (dah!)
3.this is not a lore friendly mod although i tried to minimzie the shockwave effect (you are not going to fly)
4.regarding dtd - every arrow has a rune attached to him and an method of delivery (impact,time,proximity) look at the readme file
5.forsworn and dragonborn are not changed
6.all rune have 50 damage
7.english is not my first language

REQUIREMENTS  
SKYRIM
author: ziv shteg
